translated: Sutra on the Retribution of Hungry Ghosts
Translated by an unknown person, included in the Eastern Jin Catalog
The Venerable MahÄmaudgalyÄyana, following the Buddha on Vulture Peak,
wandered to the banks of the Ganges River and saw many hungry ghosts suffering different punishments.
Seeing Venerable MaudgalyÄyana, they all gave rise to respectful thoughts and came to ask about the causes and conditions.
One ghost asked:
I am constantly suffering from headaches. I do not know what sin has caused this?
MaudgalyÄyana replied:
When you were a human, you were unable to cultivate patience and beat others' heads with a stick. Now you are experiencing the flowery retribution, and the fruit will be in the hells.
One ghost asked:
I am constantly plagued by sores. What sin has caused this?
He replied:

When you were a human, you had no compassionate thoughts. You burned mountains and fields, harming many creatures. Now you are experiencing the flowery retribution, and the fruit will be in the hells.
One ghost asked:
My whole body is covered in sores, and I cannot bear it. What sins have caused this?
He replied:
When you were a human, you enjoyed boiling pigs and sheep. Now you receive the flowery retribution, and the fruit is in hell.
A ghost asked:
I can never eat enough and am never satisfied. What sins have caused this?
He replied:
When you were a human, although you fed sentient beings, you always made it insufficient. Now you receive the flowery retribution, and the fruit is in hell.
A ghost asked:
I always suffer from headaches, and it is difficult to cure them. What sins have caused this?
He replied:
When you were a human, you did not respect morality and added insults. Now you receive the flowery retribution, and the fruit is in hell.
A ghost asked:
I give birth to children, all of whom are beautiful and lovely, but they all die young. My thoughts are unceasing. What sins have caused this?
He replied:

When you were a human, you saw your son killing living beings, you rejoiced and ate the meat. Because of killing, your life was shortened. Because of rejoicing, you suffered pain. Now you receive the flower-like retribution, and the fruit will be in hell.
A ghost asked:
I have one husband, but he keeps many wives. I should be able to stay with him, but he doesn't accept me. What offense did I commit to deserve this?
He replied:
When you were a human, you did not respect your husband, you engaged in illicit affairs without propriety. Now you receive the flower-like retribution, and the fruit will be in hell.
A ghost asked:
I always have a headache, and my male organ is ulcerated. What offense did I commit to deserve this?
He replied:
When you were a human, you engaged in sexual activity in a pure place such as a stupa. Now you receive the flower-like retribution, and the fruit will be in hell.
A ghost asked:
I have obtained this body, which is coarse, rough, and impure. What offense did I commit to deserve this?
He replied:

When you were a human, you did not respect those with virtue, you despised good people, and you threw sand and soil to smear the Å›ramaá¹‡as. Now you receive the flowery retribution, and the fruit is in hell.
A ghost asked:
I eat more than a bushel, but I am always not full. What sins have caused this?
He replied:
When you were a human, you were a bhiká¹£u, and you sought things for the saá¹ƒgha, but you ate them yourself. Now you receive the flowery retribution, and the fruit is in hell.
A ghost asked:
I have received this body with swollen legs and a goiter. What sins have caused this?
He replied:
When you were a human, you made people and animals carry heavy loads without mercy. Now you receive the flowery retribution, and the fruit is in hell.
A ghost asked:
I have received this body that always suffers from heat and thirst. What sins have caused this?
He replied:ğŸ”½When you were a human, you were a butcher. You killed sheep and sold them. You weighed them with a dishonest scale. Now you receive the flowery retribution, and the fruit is in hell.

When you were a human, you enjoyed fishing and hunting. You threw the caught fish into the sand and soil, causing them to die a painful death. Now you experience the flower-like retribution, and the fruit will be in hell.
A ghost asked:
Why did I receive this body, insane, foolish, and ignorant? What sin caused this?
He replied:
When you were a human, you gave alcohol to others. Now you experience the flower-like retribution, and the fruit will be in hell.
A ghost asked:
Why do the children I give birth to all turn around and eat me? What sin caused this?
He replied:
When you were a human, you did not cultivate filial piety and support. Now you experience the flower-like retribution, and the fruit will be in hell.
A ghost asked:
Why do I always vomit after eating? What sin caused this?
He replied:
When you were a human, someone asked for food in the afternoon. You scolded and gave it to them in anger. Now you experience the flower-like retribution, and the fruit will be in hell.
A ghost asked:
In this life, my wealth is not lacking, yet I enjoy wearing tattered clothes. What sins have caused this?
He replied:
Although you were generous when you were a person, you regretted it after giving. Now you receive the flower-like retribution, and the fruit will be in hell.
A ghost asked:
I have received this form, always leaning on the streets, without a fixed place to stay. What sins have caused this?
He replied:

When you were a person, guests came to stay but you were not hospitable. Seeing others' behavior, you became angry and scolded them. Now you receive the flower-like retribution, and the fruit will be in hell.
A ghost asked:
I have received this form, neither male nor female. What sins have caused this?
He replied:
When you were a person, you lacked compassion and liked to castrate livestock. Now you receive the flower-like retribution, and the fruit will be in hell.
A ghost asked:
I have obtained this body, but I am crippled and cannot walk. What sins have caused this?
He replied:
When you were a human, you liked to engage in unrighteousness, binding people and animals so they could not move. Now you receive the flowery retribution, and the fruit will be in hell.
A ghost asked:

This body of mine always suffers from heat and thirst. When walking, I see the Ganges River, clear and beautiful. I enter it to bathe, hoping to obtain coolness and comfort to relieve the suffering of heat;
As soon as I enter it, my whole body disintegrates. Thirsty, I want to drink from it. As soon as I take a sip, my five internal organs burn, my flesh separates from my bones.
What sins have caused this?
He replied:

When you were a human, you liked to be an astrologer, predicting people's good and bad fortune. You had little truth and much falsehood, either slandering or praising, claiming to have virtue yourself to move people's hearts, and seeking profit and support.
Moreover, you were deceitful and insincere towards your parents, siblings, and relatives. Now you receive the flowery retribution.
The fruits are in hell, suffering billions of times, which cannot be fully described.
A ghost asked:
Since I received this body,

there is always a vicious dog with a huge body and sharp teeth, its eyes blazing red, coming day and night to devour my body. Before my life ends, my flesh is restored, and I suffer this pain again, which is unbearable. What sins have caused this?
He replied:
When you were a human, you were the head of a shrine. In the shrine, you took the blood of cows and sheep to sacrifice to the gods, and ate their meat yourself. You told the people:
'By sacrificing to the gods, you will obtain great blessings!'
You committed various evils to deceive the people. Now you receive the flowery retribution, and the fruits are in hell.
A ghost asked:

I have received this body, always in an impure place, smeared all over, and whatever I eat and drink is impure. I constantly suffer this pain, unable to escape. The stench wraps around my body, and the worries are innumerable. What sins have caused this?
He replied:

When you were a human, you were a brahmin who did not believe in the Buddha's teachings and did not enjoy making offerings to Å›ramaá¹‡as and monks. If they came to beg, you always did not want to see them.
At that time, there was a monk who came to beg from you.
You thought like this:
'I will find a way to make them not come again.'
You then took a bowl, filled it with feces, covered it with rice, and gave it to the monk.

The monk obtained it and returned to his original place. He placed it to one side, washed his hands, sat down, and took the bowl. As he was about to eat, the impurities in the bowl were foul-smelling and could not be approached.

Because of these causes and conditions, I now experience the fragrant retribution, but the fruit is in hell, where I constantly swallow hot iron balls, my body is ruined, and the suffering is indescribable.
A ghost asked:
I received this body, and tongues emerge everywhere, with axes naturally appearing to cut them off, like this countless times. What sins caused this?
He replied:
When you were a human, you were a novice monk. You were appointed by the monks to take cold clean water, make rock candy drinks, and distribute them to the monks.
The rock candy was hard and large, so you hit it to take a little bit and stole a bite.
Because you stole the Sangha's property, you now experience the fragrant retribution, but the fruit is in hell, where you swallow molten copper, and the suffering is indescribable.
A ghost asked:
I received this body and am constantly suffering from hunger. I went to the toilet to try to eat feces.
There is a powerful ghost on the toilet who beats me with a stick. I cannot get close to it at first. What sins have caused this?
He replied:

When you were a person, you once served as a monk, and were the head of a Buddhist temple. You were stingy with the offerings of the Sangha, and did not offer good food to the monks, always giving them coarse and bad food.
Sometimes when you wanted to make good food, a guest monk would come, and you would stop making it. You would wait for him to leave before preparing it.
You were stingy with an evil mind, and now you receive the flowery retribution. The fruit is in hell.
A ghost asked:
I received this body, with a belly as big as a jar, and all other parts of the body are small. My throat is like a fine needle hole, and I cannot swallow food. What sins have caused this?
He replied:

When you were a person, you served as the head of a village. You relied on your power and strength to deceive the people. You always sought food and drink by unjust means, and tormented the common people. Now you receive the flowery retribution. The fruit is in hell.
A ghost asked:

I received this body with a copper pot on my shoulders, filled with molten copper. I hold a ladle in my hand and ladle it out to pour on my head, burning my entire body to shreds. This happens countless times, with immeasurable suffering. What sins have caused this?
He replied:

When you were a person, you left home to practice the path. You knew the food and drink of the monks and hid a jar of ghee elsewhere. When guest monks came, you did not give it to them. When the guests left, you took out the ghee and gave it to the regular monks.
This ghee belongs to the Saá¹ƒgha of the four directions and everyone has a share. You concealed the Saá¹ƒgha's property and gave it unequally.
For this reason, you have obtained such suffering. Now you receive the flower-like retribution, but the fruit will be in the hells, with suffering difficult to calculate.
A ghost asked:
Since I received this body, there are always people who come with knives and saws to cut and peel my body, and then break open my belly and take out my five viscera. The pain is unbearable.
In an instant, the flesh grows back and they come again to cut. What sins have caused this?
He replied:

When you were a human, you were a brahmin who did not believe in the true Dharma, always giving rise to wrong views. You served the gods and constantly made offerings of cows and sheep. Because of these sins, you now receive the flowery retribution, and the fruit will be in hell.
A ghost asked:
Since I received this body, there are always people who come with knives and saws to cut and peel my body, and then break open my belly and take out my five viscera. The pain is unbearable.
In an instant, the flesh grows back and they come again to cut. What sins have caused this?
He replied:

When you were a human, you were always the chief executioner, knowing how to kill people without any compassion, happily carrying it out. You have such sins, so you have obtained this evil. Now you receive the flower retribution, and the fruit retribution is in hell.
A ghost asked:
I have received this body, and there are always hot iron wheels turning under my two armpits. The great heat oppresses my body, and my two armpits are scorched and rotten. What sins have caused this?
He replied:

When you were a human, you left home to study the Way, and you made various kinds of pastries for the monks. Before the monks had eaten, you, with a greedy mind, stole the monks' pastries, hid them under your armpits, and ate them in a secluded place. For this reason, you have obtained such suffering. Now you receive the flower retribution, and the fruit retribution is in hell, where the suffering is immeasurable.
A ghost asked:

I have always had a natural red-hot iron ball in this body of mine. It falls from the sky, enters my mouth and reaches my stomach. Sometimes it comes out from the left and enters from the right, or comes out from the right and enters from the left. My whole body is scorched and in excruciating pain. What sins have caused this?
He replied:
When you were a person, you left home to become a novice monk. You cooked mango fruit for the monks.
When it was served to the assembly, you always gave seven pieces to He Shang.
Because of this cause and effect, you have received such evil retribution. You are now experiencing the flower-like retribution, and the fruit will be in hell.
A ghost asked:
I have received this body. When I want to move and come and go, it is like a whirlwind. I cannot go forward at first. The sorrow and distress are immeasurable. What sins have caused this?
He replied:

When you were a human, you were a fortune-teller, deceiving others, causing their minds to be confused, sometimes happy, sometimes frightened, all not true. Because of this cause and effect, you have received such evil, now experiencing the flower-like retribution, and the fruit will be in hell.
A ghost asked:
I have received this body, and there is always heat inside, as if carrying boiling water and fire, and it comes to burn and boil me, with myriad kinds of pain. What sins have caused this?
He replied:
When you were a human, you were the first wife of a king.
At that time, the king respected the younger wife, and you always gave rise to jealous thoughts, creating evil schemes, wanting to kill her.
When she was sleeping, you boiled ghee and poured it onto her stomach.
She suffered immeasurable pain and eventually died.
Because of this cause and effect, you have received such suffering, now experiencing the flower-like retribution, and the fruit will be in hell.
A ghost asked:

I have received this body, and by nature I am very fearful. I am always afraid that people will come to arrest, imprison, bind, shackle, and torture me. I have never had a happy mind. What sins have caused this?
He replied:

When you were a human, you liked to engage in adultery and violate other people's wives. You were always afraid of being discovered and your mind was never at ease. Now you are receiving the flowery retribution, and the fruit will be in the hells. Either lying on an iron bed or embracing a copper pillar, the suffering is indescribable.
A ghost asked:
I have received this body, and naturally there is a hot iron net that wraps around my body, burning and scorching it. The pain is unbearable. What sins have caused this?
He replied:
When you were a human, you always set traps and nets to kill fish and animals, and catch flying birds.
Because of these causes and conditions, you have obtained such severe suffering. Now you are receiving the flowery retribution, and the fruit will be in the hells.
A ghost asked:

I have received this body without hands or feet, like a lump of meat in the wilderness. Foxes, wolves, tigers, leopards, vultures, and various birds all come to fight over it and eat it together. The pain is indescribable. What sins have caused this?
He replied:
When you were a human, you used evil means to give medicine to pregnant women, whether it was your own or others', causing the fetus to dissolve.
Because of this cause and effect, you have obtained such suffering. Now you are receiving the flower retribution, and the fruit retribution will be in hell.
Three ghosts came at the same time and asked:

We have received this body, and there are always iron nails falling from the sky, nailing our bodies, penetrating the flesh, breaking the bones, and the pain penetrates the marrow. What sins have caused this?
He replied:
When you were humans, one was a horse trainer, one was a cow trainer, and one was an elephant trainer.

If you greedily take others' wealth, pierce them with needles, and cause them to suffer pain, but do not remove the pain, because of this cause and condition, you will receive such suffering. Now you experience the flower-like retribution, and the fruit is in hell.
A ghost asked:
I have received this body without a head or neck. My eyes, ears, nose, and mouth are all on my chest. What sins have caused this?
He replied:
When you were a person, if you saw someone killing, you helped by grabbing the head and joyfully pulled, without any compassionate heart.
Because of this cause and condition, you have received such a body. Now you experience the flower-like retribution, and the fruit is in hell.
After Mulian answered the ghosts, they all gave rise to respectful hearts and ran forward to repent.
Mulian saw their joy and further spoke the Dharma for them.
After the ghosts heard it, they were all greatly delighted.
The Sutra on the Retribution of Hungry Ghosts
